QuestData.Title: Spilling Bad Blood
QuestData.Description:
Ending the evil of the Blood Prince will be a boon to this land, but we can't just allow these crazed corsairs to run amok. I'm afraid there is no choice but to put them to the sword.
Carry out this noble deed, my good fellow, and we will celebrate with a nice warm lager.
QuestData.RewardText: Good riddance to bad rubbish, I say. $B$BThose louts were ne'er-do-wells before they went crazy. Just imagine what they would do if we let them run rampant!$B$BCheers to your bravery, sir.
